content.question: In the setup shown above, a student uses motion detector <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> to measure the speed <math alttext="v sub i" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> of a cart with mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> before it collides with and sticks to a stationary cart with mass <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Motion detector <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> measures the speed <math alttext="v sub f " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> of the carts after the collision. The student repeats the experiment several times using different values of <math alttext="v sub i" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and creates a graph of <math alttext="v sub f " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="v sub i" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. The slope of this graph is most nearly equal to

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction lowercase m over uppercase M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator lowercase m and denominator uppercase M plus lowercase m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator uppercase M minus lowercase m, and denominator uppercase M plus lowercase m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator lowercase m and denominator uppercase M plus lowercase m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator lowercase m and denominator uppercase M plus lowercase m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
